sub_title: Director @ Economic Board Utrecht || Supervisory Board @ NTR, LM, TJ || Advisor & Public Speaker || Father & Husband
summary:
USPs: Innovation | New Economy | Education | Internationalisation | Public-Private | Asian Business Culture | Network | Board | Technology | Society | 

Described by peers as an energetic person, very interested in governing, managing and coordinating complex strategic processes and teams. Someone who enjoys face-to-face conversations, strategic policy, external relations, corporate communications and politics. 

Michiel's ambition is to get a high level leadership role within an organisation by using strategic governance, policy, corporate communications and politics. He has an outward looking and international outlook. 

He has 15 years full time professional and managerial experience and he has worked part time and served on the (supervisory) boards of a number of organisations for over 20 years.

profile_positions.description:
Economic Board Utrecht (EBU) aims to position the metropolitan region Utrecht (1.5 million citizens) worldwide as the beating heart of a healthy society. It is a top network containing of C-level representatives of companies, knowledge institutions and local authorities. By combining their network, thinking and lobbying power, the parties want to become an international leader when it comes to their contribution to healthy people in a healthy living environment.

The 28 organisations represented by C-level in EBU are a.s.r., Nyenrode Business University, Hogeschool Utrecht, RIVM, Arcadis, Ballast Nedam, Rabobank, gemeente Amersfoort, gemeente Hilversum, NPO, Jaarbeurs, Royal HaskoningDHV, Universiteit Utrecht, NS, UMC Utrecht, PON, Provincie Utrecht, Achmea, Genmab, ROM Regio Utrecht, FC Utrecht, ProRail, FrieslandCampina, VodafoneZiggo, ROC Midden Nederland, TivoliVredenburg, Plus Holding & Gemeente Utrecht.

profile_positions.description:
The Minister of Education, Culture and Science decided by ministerial decree to appoint M.C.T.H. Dijkman as member of the Supervisory Board [Lid van de Raad van Toezicht] of Foundation NTR (national public-service broadcaster, supplying television and radio programming of an informational, educational, and cultural nature). Programs like School-TV, Nieuwsuur, College Tour, Podium and Klokhuis.

profile_positions.description: 90 FTE | Tobas Jeugdhulp biedt jeugdigen en gezinnen een hoopvolle toekomst. Dit doen we met een betrokken én persoonlijke aanpak, zowel in onze leefgroepen als bij situaties waar ambulante hulp volstaat. Bovendien kan Tobas Mediation als mediator optreden bij conflicten in de familiaire sfeer. Daarnaast helpt Tobas Werken en Leren social returnkandidaten hun weg naar de arbeidsmarkt te vinden. Ingretatie van Somnium B.V.

profile_positions.description: Nuffic is the Dutch organisation for internationalisation in education. The 375 Nuffic employees operate on behalf of the Ministry of Education, Culture and Science, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the European Commission. Nuffic's ambition is for all pupils and students -from primary and secondary education to vocational and higher education, research and adult education- to have the opportunity to acquire international competencies, whether at home or abroad. This will prepare them for the society and labour market of the future and ensure that they are ready to tackle the global challenges of our time.

Sjtadsprins va Kirchroa | D'r Kirchröatsjer Vasteloavends Verain 'Alaaf Kirchroa 1936'
volunteer_experiences.description: Kirchröatsjer Vasteloavends Verain 'Alaaf Kirchroa 1936' is the city carnival association of Kerkrade (L) and belongs to the group of 17 largest city carnival associations in Limburg (SLV). In 2011, as Sjtadsprins, I was allowed to lead the carnival celebrators of Kerkrade. Since 2012, I have been a member of the Prinseroad and in that capacity co-organizer of the annual gala ball with yearly 1000+ visitors.

[Honorary position / Remunerated]
Unicoz Education Group stands for the vision that every child is unique, that attention is paid to the talents of the pupils. With 872 employees spread over 23 primary schools and two secondary education locations, Unicoz offers a safe and challenging learning environment to more than 6,100 pupils and 2,000 secondary school students. The schools are focused on innovative, high-quality education and aimed at the optimal development of every child. Each school has its own profile to suit the needs of pupils, students and parents.

2015-2018: Advisory Board 
2018-Now: Committee of Recommendation

[Honorary position / Unremunerated]
Music has been an important part of our culture for centuries and contributes to the positive development of people. Music associations therefore have the role of making a positive contribution to the community. Our society is constantly changing, to which music associations also have to respond. The factor "time" of volunteers as well as the digitization of our society means that we have to look for other ways to sustainably preserve this cultural heritage.

[Honorary position / Unremunerated]

volunteer_experiences.description:
[Honorary position / Unremunerated]
Platform Digital Citizenship (in Dutch: Platform Digitaal Burgerschap) inspires and accelerates the public discussion in the Netherlands regarding the sense of urgency to act on subjects like eGovernment, eVoting, eHealth, e-Education and e-Economy. The cooperation between private, public, NGOs, science & citizens is essential to be successfull.

[Honorary position / Unremunerated] 
Allyoucanlearn is a collaboration between 39 partners from the education sector, healthcare sector, industry and other parties. They all work together on open education for the Care and Welfare sector and a better connection between education and the professional field.
